actionAppleScript.inline: "Screen Shot " & (current date) & ".png" do shell script "screencapture ~/Desktop/" & quoted form of result
"Screen Shot " & (current date) & ".png" do shell script "screencapture -i ~/Desktop/" & quoted form of result
"Screen Shot " & (current date) & ".png" do shell script "screencapture -b ~/Desktop/" & quoted form of result
tell application "System Events" to key code 2 using control down
